challenge.title: Challenge 28
challenge.author: Bhanudev Chaluvadi Spyros Gasteratos
challenge.description: You are again given the task to perform a Man-In-Middle Attack by your Security Agency.This time, both the parties are using the secure Diffie-Hellman Key Exchange protocol for generating keys.You have to perform the MIM attack during this key exchange.You can read about this key exchange protocol here
